peganotify-desc: Provides a custom notification mechanism for Pega.
peganotify-notification-header-expiring-: The verified status of [[$1]] is scheduled to expire in less than $2. You have been identified as the owner of this page. Please visit the page and re-verify it soon.
peganotify-notification-subject-expiring: The verified status of [[$1]] on {{SITENAME}} is scheduled to expire in less than $2. You have been identified as the owner of this page. Please visit the page and re-verify it soon.
peganotify-notification-header-expiring-: The verified status of [[$1]] is scheduled to expire in less than $2. This page is located in the [[$3:Home|$3]] hub that you administer. Please visit the page and have the page owner verify it soon.
peganotify-notification-subject-expiring: The verified status of [[$1]] on {{SITENAME}} is scheduled to expire in less than $2. This page is located in the [[$3:Home|$3]] hub that you administer. Please visit the page and have the page owner verify it soon.
